models.name: Gunnbjorn 2
models.title: Mercenary Trollblood Vengeance of Dhunia Warlock

characterabilities.name: Conflicted Heart
characterabilities.description: If this model is not in a Trollbloods army, and makes a roll against a Trollkin model, it rolls one fewer die.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Llael, Ord]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Llael, Ord.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Cygnar, Trollbloods, Vengeance of Dhunia]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Cygnar, Trollbloods, Vengeance of Dhunia armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Special Issue [Trollkin Barrage Team]
characterabilities.description: You may include Trollkin Barrage Team units in armies that include this model and when included, the models become models of that faction and don't count as models for other factions on its card.

feat.name: Bombing Run
feat.description: Gunnbjorn and friendly Faction models beginning their activation in his Control range gain Reposition [3”] and their ranged weapons gain Full Force. Bombing Run lasts for one turn. (The POW of blast damage caused by a weapon with Full Force is equal to the POW of the weapon.)

topability.name: Battle Plan
topability.description: This model can use one of the following plans at any time during its activation. A friendly Faction model/unit can be affected by only one plan each turn.

subabilities.name: Bring it Down
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly non-leader warrior model. If the model is in range, it immediately makes one basic ranged attack. During this attack, the model gains boosted ranged accuracy and damage rolls.

subabilities.name: Relay Coordinates
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly unit. If the unit is in range, models in the unit gain Hunter. Relay Coordinates lasts for one turn.

subabilities.name: Unload!
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly Warbeast. If the Warbeast is in rage, its ranged weapons gain +1 ROF. Unload! Lasts for one turn.

ability.name: Armor-Piercing
ability.description: When calculating damage from this weapon, halve the base ARM stats of the models hit.

ability.name: Thunderbolt
ability.description: Enemy models hit are pushed d3" directly away from the attacking model. On a critical hit, the enemy model becomes knocked down after being pushed.

spells.name: Explosivo
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model's ranged weapons gain Damage Type: Arcane. If the affected model directly hits and boxes an enemy model with an attack from a ranged weapon, center a 3" AOE on the boxed model, then remove that model from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer an unboostable POW 10 magical blast damage roll.

spells.name: Expose
spells.description: Place a 5” AOE completely within the spellcaster's Control range. While within the AOE, enemy models lose and cannot gain Stealth or Shield Guard and do not gain bonuses from spells, including animi, that add to their ARM or DEF.

spells.name: Foxhole
spells.description: Place a 5" AOE anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control Range where it does not touch a model's base, an obstruction or an obstacle. Models completely within the AOE have cover and do not suffer blast damage. When drawing LOS to the model not completely within the AOE, ignore intervening models completely within the AOE.

spells.name: Relentless Barrage
spells.description: Target warbeast in this model's battlegroup that is in its Control range can immediately make one basic melee or ranged attack. A model can be targeted by Relentless Barrage only once per turn.

products.name: Calandra Truthsayer, Oracle of the Glimmerwood

characterabilities.name: Fate Blessed
characterabilities.description: When a friendly Faction model makes an accuracy or damage roll during its activation while in this model's Control range, this model can spend 1 focus point to allow the model to reroll that roll. Each roll can be rerolled once as a result of Fate Blessed.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Vengeance of Dhunia]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Vengeance of Dhunia armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Soothing Song
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, anytime during your activation phase except while activating a model, this model can spend 1 fury to remove up to 1 fury point from each friendly living Faction warbeast in this model's Control Range.

feat.name: Good Omens
feat.description: When a friendly Faction model rolls a 1 or 2 on a die in an accuracy or damage roll while in Calandra Truthsayer's Control range, it can reroll the die. Each die can be rerolled only once as a result of Good Omens. Good Omens lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Future Sight
execution.description: This model can boost attack accuracy and damage rolls after rolling.

spells.name: Befuddle
spells.description: On a hit, you can immediately advance target enemy non-Leader model up to 3”. A model can move only once as a result of befuddle.

spells.name: Bullet Dodger
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model gains +2 DEF and Dodge. (A model with Dodge can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.).

spells.name: Discombobulate
spells.description: Both the front arc and back arc of target model/unit is treated as it's back arc.

spells.name: Misfortune
spells.description: A model damaged by Misfortune becomes knocked down.

spells.name: Star-Crossed
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control range, enemy models gain an additional die on accuracy rolls. Discard the highest die of each roll. Star-Crossed lasts for one round.

models.title: Cygnar Trollblood Vengeance of Dhunia Warlock

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Kill Shot] [Gunfighter]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Kill Shot. (Once per activation, when an enemy model is destroyed or removed from play as a result of a melee attack made by this model during its activation, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can make one basic ranged attack.)

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Cygnar, Trollbloods, Vengeance of Dhunia]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Cygnar, Trollbloods, Vengeance of Dhunia armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Resourceful
characterabilities.description: This model can upkeep spells on models in it's battlegroup without spending focus or fury.

characterabilities.name: Special Issue [Trollblood Warbeasts]
characterabilities.description: You may include Trollblood warbeasts in armies that include this model and when included, the models become models of that faction and don't count as models for other factions on its card.

feat.name: Fortification
feat.description: While in Gunnbjorn's Control range, friendly Faction models gain cover, do not suffer damage from ranged attacks, and cannot become knocked down. Fortification lasts for one round.

execution.name: Girded
execution.description: This model and models B2B with it gain Resistance: Blast.

ability.name: Critical Devastation
ability.description: On a critical hit, models hit are thrown d6" directly away from the attacker. Roll distance once for all models affected. Move models farthest from the attacker first. Instead of suffering blast damage, models hit but not directly hit suffer a damage roll with POW of collateral damage is equal to the blast damage POW of this weapon.

spells.name: Explosivo
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model's ranged weapons gain Damage Type: Arcane. If the affected model directly hits and boxes an enemy model with an attack from a ranged weapon, center a 3" AOE on the boxed model, then remove that model from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer an unboostable POW 10 magical blast damage roll.

spells.name: Guided Fire
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in its battlegroup gain boosted Ranged Accuracy rolls for one turn.

spells.name: Rock Wall
spells.description: Place a wall template anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control Range where it does not touch a model's base, an obstruction, or an obstacle. The wall is an obstacle that provides cover.

spells.name: Sentry
spells.description: Target friendly Faction gains Rapid Fire. (A model with Rapid Fire can make one basic ranged attack during your Maintenance Phase.).

spells.name: Snipe
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model's/unit's non spray ranged weapons gain +4 RNG.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [any]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for any.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Trollbloods, Vengeance of Dhunia]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Trollbloods, Vengeance of Dhunia armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Take Down
characterabilities.description: Models disabled by a melee attack made by this model cannot make a Tough roll. Models boxed by a melee attack made by this model are removed from play.

characterabilities.name: True Sight
characterabilities.description: This model ignores cloud effects when determining LOS. This model also ignores Stealth.

feat.name: Spread the Net
feat.description: While in Grim's Control range, enemy models suffer -3 DEF. Enemy models beginning their activations in Grim's Control range suffer -3 SPD and cannot charge or make power attacks or special attacks. Spread the Net lasts for one round.

execution.name: Prey
execution.description: After deployment but before the first player's turn, choose an enemy model/unit to be this model/unit's prey. This model gains +2 to attack accuracy and damage rolls against it's prey. When the prey is destroyed or removed from play, choose another model/unit to be the prey.

ability.name: Bait the Line
ability.description: Warbeasts in this model's battlegroup gain +2” of movement when charging a model damaged by this weapon this turn. Additionally, Warbeasts in this model's battlegroup cna charge enemy models hit by this weapon this turn without being forced.

ability.name: Witch Mark
ability.description: If this attack hits an enemy model during this model's activation, until the end of that activation this model can target and automatically hit that enemy model with spells, ignoring RNG and LOS.

ability.name: Cumbersome
ability.description: This model cannot make initial attacks with this weapon and another weapon on the same activation.

ability.name: Knockdown
ability.description: When a model is hit by an attack with this weapon, it becomes knocked down.

spells.name: Bear Trap
spells.description: A Model directly hit becomes knocked down.

spells.name: Marked For Death
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2 DEF, loses Incorporeal and Stealth, and cannot gain Incorporeal or Stealth while affected by Marked for Death.

spells.name: Return Fire
spells.description: When target friendly Faction model is targeted by an enemy ranged attack, after the attack is resolved the affected model can make one basic melee or ranged attack, then Return fire expires. Return Fire lasts for one round.

spells.name: Weald Secrets
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Pathfinder and Hunter. (A model with Hunter ignores concealment and cover when making a ranged attack.).

characterabilities.name: Warrant Officer [Circular Vision]
characterabilities.description: While this model is alive, and not under enemy control, non-cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Circular Vision. (Models never gain a back strike bonus against a model with Circular Vision.)

characterabilities.name: Exhaust Fumes
characterabilities.description: When this model advances during it's Normal Movement, for one round other friendly models gain concealment while within 3" of this model.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Vengeance of Dhunia]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Vengeance of Dhunia armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Wild Ride
characterabilities.description: Light and heavy warbeasts in this model's battlegroup gain Cavalry, Pathfinder and Reposition [3”]. When an affected warbeast makes an impact attack, that attack has a base POW equal to its STR. The melee range of impact attacks is 1”. Affected warbeasts do not gain Mount attacks from Wild Ride.

feat.name: Highway to Hell
feat.description: Helga immediately casts Engine of Destruction without spending fury. Additionally, when a friendly Faction model in Helga's Control range hits one or more enemy models with an attack during its activation, at the end of it's activation the attacking model can make a full advance. The affected model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement. Highway to Hell lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Dodge
execution.description: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

ability.name: Brain Damage
ability.description: A model damaged by an attack with this weapon cannot cast spells for one round.

ability.name: Pull
ability.description: If this model hits an enemy model with an equal or smaller base with a basic attack with this weapon, after the attack is resolved the hit model can be pushed directly toward this model until it contacts a model, an obstacle, or an obstruction.

ability.name: Critical Knockdown
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down.

ability.name: Grinding Wheel
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die on accuracy rolls against small- and medium-based models.

spells.name: Battering Ram
spells.description: An enemy model hit by Battering Ram can be pushed 3" directly away from the spell's point of Origin.

spells.name: Battle Host
spells.description: Warbeasts in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in it's Control Range gain +2" movement when advancing as part of their Normal Movement. The spellcaster gains +2 ARM while one or more warbeasts in it's battlegroup are within 3" of it.

spells.name: Engine of Destruction
spells.description: The Spellcaster gains +2 SPD, +4 MAT and +4 to melee attack damage rolls for one turn.

spells.name: Primed
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +2 to melee accuracy and damage rolls but suffers -2 ARM. If an affected model is disabled by an enemy attack, center a 3” AOE on it and remove that model from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer an unboostable POW 14 blast damage roll.

spells.name: Rapport
spells.description: Target warbeast in the spellcaster's battlegroup can use the spellcaster's current MAT and RAT in place of its own. When checking to see if the affected warbeast is in its controller's Control Range, double the range.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Gang Fighter]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Gang Fighter. (A model with Gang Fighter gains +2 to melee attack accuracy and melee damage rolls when making a melee attack targeting an enemy model in the melee range of another friendly Faction warrior model.)

characterabilities.name: Flank [Friendly Faction Cohort]
characterabilities.description: When this model makes a melee attack against an enemy model in the melee range of a friendly Friendly Faction Cohort model, this model gains +2 to attack rolls and gains an additional damage die.

characterabilities.name: Gang Fighter
characterabilities.description: When making a melee attack targeting an enemy model in the melee range of another friendly Faction warrior model, this model gains +2 to melee attack accuracy and melee damage rolls.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Vengeance of Dhunia]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Vengeance of Dhunia armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Set Defense
characterabilities.description: A model in this model's front arc suffers -2 on charge, slam power attack, and impact attack accuracy rolls against this model.

characterabilities.name: Veteran Leader [Farrow Valkyries]
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, Farrow Valkyries models gain +1 to attack accuracy rolls.

feat.name: Grand Finale
feat.description: Friendly Faction models currently in this model's Control range gain Pitch on their range weapons. When a friendly Faction model in Helga's Control range hits an enemy model with a basic melee attack, instead of making a normal damage roll, the enemy model can be slammed d6” directly away from the attacking model. The POW of the slam damage roll is equal to the P+S of the Attack. The POW of collateral damage rolls is equal to the STR of the attacking model. Grand Finale lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Groundwork
execution.description: While knocked down, this model is not automatically hit by melee attacks and its DEF is not reduced by being knocked down.

ability.name: Inflict Pain
ability.description: When this weapon hits a warbeast, this model can place 1 fury point on or remove 1 fury point from the hit warbeast.

spells.name: Cyclone
spells.description: The spellcaster immediately makes a full advance, ignoring freestrikes during this movement. At the end of this movement, the spellcaster can make one basic melee attack against each model in its LOS that is in its melee range. Cyclone can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Dash
spells.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction warrior models activating in its Control Range gain +1 SPD. While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly Faction warrior models gain Unstoppable. Dash lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Defender's Ward
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 DEF and ARM. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Distraction
spells.description: Target warrior model/unit cannot make ranged attacks and suffer -2 DEF and MAT for one round.

spells.name: Muzzle
spells.description: An enemy warbeast damaged by Muzzle cannot advance toward the spellcaster for one round.

products.name: Hoarluk Doomshaper, Dire Prophet & Scroll Bearers

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Hyper-Regeneration]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Hyper-Regeneration. (Remove d3 damage points from this model at the start of each of it's activations.)

characterabilities.name: Hyper-Regeneration
characterabilities.description: Remove d3 damage points from this model at the start of each of it's activations.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Vengeance of Dhunia]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Vengeance of Dhunia armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

feat.name: Blood of Dhunia
feat.description: While within Doomshaper's Control range, models in his battlegroup gain an additional die on melee accuracy rolls. When a model in Doomshaper's battlegroup that is in his Control range is hit by an enemy attack, after the attack is resolved remove d3+3 damage points from the model. Blood of Dhunia lasts for one round.

execution.name: Reposition [3"]
execution.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

ability.name: Smite (★Attack)
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit can be slammed d6" directly away from this model. If the model hit has a larger base than the attacking model, it is moved only half the distance rolled. The POW of collateral damage is equal to the STR of this model.

spells.name: Admonition
spells.description: When an enemy model advances and ends its movement or is warped within 6" of target model in this spellcaster's battlegroup, the affected model can immediately advance up to 3", then Admonition expires.

spells.name: Implacability
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control range, models in its battlegroup cannot become knocked down, cannot be placed or pushed, and cannot be moved by a slam. Implacability lasts for one round.

spells.name: Repudiate
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Repudiate immediately expires. When an upkeep spell expires as a result of Repudiate, the model maintaining the spell suffers d3 damage points.

spells.name: Stranglehold
spells.description: A model damaged by Stranglehold forfeits either its Normal Movement or its Combat Action during it's next activation as its Controller chooses.

spells.name: Unminding
spells.description: Target enemy warbeast suffer -2 FURY and THR and loses its animus. The spellcaster can cast an affected warbeast's animus as if the animus belonged to a warbeast in the spellcaster's battlegroup and Control range.

topability.name: Scroll Bearer
topability.description: Once per turn, while within 1” of this model, Doomshaper can use one of the following scrolls. Each scroll can be used only once per game.

subabilities.name: Scroll of Grindar's Perseverance
subabilities.description: This model can use Scroll of Grindar's Perseverance only once per game when directly hit by an attack. This model suffers no damage roll from the attack. Declare use of the scroll after this model is hit but before the damage roll is made.

subabilities.name: Scroll of the Call of Troqal
subabilities.description: At any time during Doomshaper's activation, while in his Control range, each warbeast in his battlegroup can gain 0 fury when forced to use its animus instead of gaining fury points equal to the COST of the animus. Scroll of the Call of Troqal lasts for one turn.

subabilities.name: Scroll of the Hand of Yolandi
subabilities.description: Scroll Of The Hand Of Yolandi - At any time during Doomshaper's activation, while in his Control range, enemy models pay double the focus, fury or essence point cost to cast or upkeep spells. Scroll of the Hand of Yolandi lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Scroll of the Strength of the Molgur
subabilities.description: At any time during Doomshaper's activation, while in his Control range, friendly Faction warrior models gain an additional die on accuracy rolls. Discard the lowest die in each roll. Scroll of the Strength of the Molgur lasts for one turn.

subabilities.name: Scroll of the Will of Balasar
subabilities.description: While in Doomshaper's Control range, when a warbeast frenzies in its Control range. This model's controller chooses the warbeast's frenzy target.

characterabilities.name: Attuned Spirit
characterabilities.description: Once per activation, this model can cast the animus of friendly faction warbeast in it's battlegroup without spending fury.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Overtake]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Overtake. (When a model with Overtake destroys one or more enemy models with a basic melee attack during its Combat Action, after the attack is resolved it can immediately advance up to 1".)

characterabilities.name: Hyper-Regeneration
characterabilities.description: Remove d3 damage points from this model at the start of each of it's activations.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Vengeance of Dhunia]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Vengeance of Dhunia armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Scroll of Grimmr's Demise
characterabilities.description: Once per game, when a warbeast is destroyed in this model's CTRL range, Doomshaper can cast the warbeasts animus as a spell until the end of his next activation.

characterabilities.name: Soothing Song
characterabilities.description: Once per turn, anytime during your activation phase except while activating a model, this model can spend 1 fury to remove up to 1 fury point from each friendly living Faction warbeast in this model's Control Range.

feat.name: Scroll of Grimmr
feat.description: Doomshaper and friendly Faction warbeasts in his battlegroup beginning their activations in his Control range gain +3 SPD and can charge or make slam or trample power attacks without being forced. Scroll of Grimmr lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Forest Walk
execution.description: At the start or end of your activation while completely within a forest, this model can use Forest Walk. If it does, choose a location completely within a forest. Remove this model from the forest and warp it to the chosen location. This model cannot use Forest Walk while knocked down.

ability.name: Dominator
ability.description: When Doomshaper damages an enemy warbeast with a Willbreaker attack, immediately after the attack has been resolved, Doomshaper's controller takes Control of the warbeast and turns it to face any direction. The warbeast then charges a model chosen by Doomshaper's controller. Doomshaper loses Control of the warbeast after the charge attack is resolved. A model can only be affected by Dominator once per turn.

ability.name: Powerful Attack
ability.description: When attacking with this weapon, this model can spend 1 focus point to boost all attack accuracy and damage rolls for the attack.

spells.name: Agitation
spells.description: Place 1 fury point on each enemy warbeast in range. Affected warbeasts suffer -3 THR and can not cast their Animus unless it is RNG SELF. This spell can only be cast once per turn.

spells.name: Primal Shock
spells.description: Choose a friendly Faction warbeast in the spellcaster's Control Range. Target a model within 8" of the chosen warbeast and make a magic attack against it. The chosen warbeast is the attack's point of origin. If the enemy model is hit, it suffers a damage roll with a POW equal to the warbeast's base STR.

spells.name: Psycho Surgery
spells.description: Each model in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range can immediately remove d3+1 damage points. This spell can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Sunder Spirit
spells.description: An enemy warbeast damaged by Sunder Spirit loses its animus for one round.
